name: Barbell Back Squat
instructions: Position bar on upper back and set stance shoulder-width.
Descend by bending hips and knees to at least parallel.
Drive through heels to stand.
tips: Keep chest up and knees tracking toes.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hinge at hips keeping back straight.
Lower weights to mid-shin and return by driving hips forward.
Maintain slight knee bend.
tips: Focus on hamstring stretch, not lumbar rounding.

name: Walking Lunges
instructions: Step forward and lower until both knees are ~90°.
Push through front heel to step forward with other leg.
Alternate legs with rhythm.
tips: Keep torso upright and knee aligned over ankle.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit and place feet shoulder-width on platform.
Lower platform toward you with control.
Press through heels to extend legs without locking knees.
tips: Keep lower back on pad and focus on heel drive.
ratingDesc: High-volume leg builder with low skill demand.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot elevated on bench, front foot forward.
Lower until front thigh near parallel, push up through front heel.
Keep torso upright and core tight.
tips: Use lighter loads until balance improves.
ratingDesc: Powerful unilateral quad and glute move.

name: Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on an elevated surface with heels hanging.
Raise heels as high as possible, pause, then lower slowly.
Use controlled tempo and full ROM.
tips: Don’t rush — slow eccentrics build muscle.
ratingDesc: Key for calf strength and shape.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, drive hips up by squeezing glutes.
Pause at top then lower with control.
Add weight across hips for progression.
tips: Drive through heels and avoid lumbar extension.
ratingDesc: Excellent for glute activation and strength.

name: Step-Up
instructions: Step up onto bench driving through heel, step down controlled.
Alternate legs or repeat on one side for sets.
Keep torso upright and core tight.
